edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.conic

Class ConicReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.conic.ConicReasoner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroundKernelStore, Reasoner

    public class ConicReasoner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reasoner
    Reasoner that uses a ConicProgramSolver to minimize the total weighted incompatibility.

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String CONFIG_PREFIX
        Prefix of property keys used by this class.
        See Also:
        ConfigManager, Constant Field Values

      • CPS_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CPS_KEY
        Key for Factory or String property. Should be set to a ConicProgramSolverFactory (or the binary name of one). The ConicReasoner will use this ConicProgramSolverFactory to instantiate a ConicProgramSolver, which will then be used for inference.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CPS_DEFAULT

        public static final ConicProgramSolverFactory CPS_DEFAULT
        Default value for CPS_KEY property. Value is instance of HomogeneousIPMFactory.

      • changedGroundKernel

        public void changedGroundKernel(GroundKernel gk)
        Description copied from interface: GroundKernelStore
        Notifies this store that a GroundKernel was changed.

        Any component that modifies a GroundKernel in this store should call this method.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernel in interface GroundKernelStore
        Parameters:
        gk - the changed GroundKernel

      • changedGroundKernelWeight

        public void changedGroundKernelWeight(GroundCompatibilityKernel gk)
        Description copied from interface: GroundKernelStore
        Notifies this store that a GroundCompatibilityKernel's weight was changed.

        This method should be called whenever the weight of a GroundCompatibilityKernel in this store is changed, or the weight of its parent CompatibilityKernel is changed (and the GroundCompatibilityKernel's weight is still tied to it).

        It is not necessary to also call GroundKernelStore.changedGroundKernel(GroundKernel) if only the weight was changed.

        Specified by:
        changedGroundKernelWeight in interface GroundKernelStore
        Parameters:
        gk - the ground kernel with a changed weight

      • changedGroundKernelWeights

        public void changedGroundKernelWeights()
        Description copied from interface: GroundKernelStore

      • optimize

        public void optimize()
        Description copied from interface: Reasoner
        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the this Reasoner's GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.
        Specified by:
        optimize in interface Reasoner
